name: A Dream Bathed in Salt
description:
This is a university project for RMIT Bachelor of Design (Games). The premise was simply to create an interactive experience within an outdoors, or indoors environment. I chose to depict a dreamscape which I once imagined in my sleep.

The nature of the game is blatantly mysterious, hence I shall refrain from explaining how it works exactly. All you must know to play is:

  • Move with WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Look around with the mouse
  • Jump with Space Bar

COMPLETELY ROYALTY FREE SOUNDS USED INGAME:
- https://freesound.org/people/spoonbender/sounds/244942/
- https://freesound.org/people/ElanHickler/sounds/38961/

Music Credits:

Composers: Josh Hickman (insta: @joshhickmanmusic)

and Ionatán Biniamin Maghidman
